Simplifying Machine Learning with PyCaret

This document excerpt details a book titled "Simplifying Machine Learning with PyCaret," a low-code approach designed for both beginners and experienced users in the field of machine learning. The book, authored by Giannis Tolios, is available for purchase on Leanpub. It utilizes the PyCaret library, which aims to streamline the machine learning workflow. The excerpt outlines the book's structure, including a preface, author biography, a brief introduction to machine learning, and details on prerequisites, software requirements, and installation procedures. Specifically, it highlights the Lean Publishing process employed by Leanpub, emphasizing iterative publishing and reader feedback to refine the book. The document provides a foundational overview of machine learning concepts, defining what machine learning is. It also details the resources available, such as a Github repository, and the use of JupyterLab for interactive development. The core focus is on making machine learning accessible through a low-code framework, catering to a broad range of skill levels. The Leanpub platform is central to the book's development and distribution, reflecting a modern approach to publishing technical content. The excerpt serves as an introduction to the book's content and the overall methodology.

Key Concepts:

  • This book is for sale at http://leanpub.com/pycaretbook
  • Lean Publishing is the act of publishing an in-progress ebook using lightweight tools and many iterations to get reader feedback, pivot until you have the right book and build traction once you do.
